casebody.data:
STRUCTURED ASSETS TRUST, Plaintiff-Respondent,
v.
Randall R. LONG, Defendant,
and
Charlotte F. Lewis, Defendant-Petitioner. C-140 September Term 2017
079329 Supreme Court of New Jersey. October 16, 2017

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-000164-14 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied, with costs.
